{"step_by_step_thinking": "The untranslated regions of mRNAs, as mentioned in Document [1], can determine gene expression by influencing mRNA stability and translational efficiency. Document [3] states that the 3′-UTR often contains regulatory regions that post-transcriptionally influence gene expression. Document [5] also mentions that several roles in gene expression have been attributed to the untranslated regions, including mRNA stability, mRNA localization, and translational efficiency.
